Or customize a repository for landing pages

<form>
    <div class="input-field black-input">
        <span class="user-icon"></span>

        <input type="email" placeholder="Enter your email..." />
    </div>

    <div class="input-field black-input">
        <select>
            <option value="">Unnamed</option>
            <option value="">Unnamed</option>
            <option value="">Unnamed</option>
        </select>
    </div>
